# [Between Two Plants: a Q&A with Jake Brunner on Shifting Gears and Quelling Fears](./between-two-plants.md)

_May 21, 2024_ | [:fontawesome-brands-meetup: Meetup](https://www.meetup.com/python-spokane/events/298346579/){target=_blank}

Join us for an armchair interview with Jake Brunner, former jeweler and jack of all trades turned self taught software engineer! Jake will share his story to becoming a professional software engineer and lessons he learned along the way that you can apply to your our journey.

RSVP on [Meetup](https://www.meetup.com/python-spokane/events/298346579/)!

<!-- index: end -->

## About

Jake Brunner, originally from Houston, Texas, is a man of many hats.  With a primary background as a jeweler and stone cutter, he found his calling as a software engineer after a slew of diverse locales and professions. His many adventures and stories reflect his insatiable curiosity and knack for invention, showcasing a unique blend of artistic flair and engineering acumen.
